title.rendered: Yves Grey Dining Side Chair Set Of 2

excerpt.rendered:
Details & Overview

  • Contemporary styling adds a touch of modernity to any living space
  • Live Smart performance fabric ensures easy cleaning and stain resistance
  • Gold metal pin on top back provides a stylish accent
  • Thick seat offers exceptional comfort for extended sitting
  • Tapered front legs create a sleek and elegant look

Upgrade your living space with the Yves parson dining chair. With its contemporary styling and Live Smart performance fabric, this chair combines aesthetics with functionality. The touch of sophistication, while the Live Smart fabric ensures easy cleaning and stain resistance, making it perfect for daily use. The chair is accented by a gold metal pin on the top back, adding an elegant detail to the design.

Designed with comfort in mind, the Yves parson dining chair features a thick seat that provides exceptional support and comfort for extended sitting. The tapered front legs create a sleek and modern look, complementing the overall aesthetics of the chair.

*Note: All Of Our Items Are Made to Order.*
